data.eml:eml: A new early dinosaur (Sauropodomorpha) from the Caturrita Formation (Late Triassic), Paraná Basin, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leal, Luciano A., Azevedo, Sergio A. K., Kellner, Alexander W. A., Da, Átila A. S., Rosa (2004): A new early dinosaur (Sauropodomorpha) from the Caturrita Formation (Late Triassic), Paraná Basin, Brazil. Zootaxa 690: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169421
